verse.name: v1
v2
verse.lines:
Hide me, hide me, hide me O, Lord.
Won't you hide me, hide me, hide me
In Your holiness, hide me in Your holiness.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Take my life an offering,
All of me to You I bring.
Praise to You, O, spotless Lamb,
Hide me in Your holiness,
Hide me in Your holiness.
